name: Legends of Nokia
description:
A Turn based Nokia style game. Enjoy😀

Be nice to me guys, its a bad game i know. 😞

The Up and Down buttons are confusing to select on desktop. (Smallest is selected) Poor design sorry. 🤷

Controls - WASD or Arrow Keys (Confirm with Space or Enter)

Android (download app below) -  Slide screen towards direction (Press buttons)

Bug #1 - if you go to Credits before Play it turns off the looped gameplay soundtrack.

Bug #2 - if you unlock the cell door and stand inside, if enemy blocks you inside sometimes the enemy can't attack you, therefore the game "softlocks" here.

Bug #3 - Fleeing from final boss makes you go to ending credits. LOL

*Spoiler in bottom*

How to finish game? - After getting weapon(on Floor -3) climb to Floor 35 and Defeat the only enemy on the floor "Motorola". I Recommend being level 12 before attempting to fight Motorola.
